metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12149 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged.
metadata.Description: In Jboss Application Server as shipped with Red Hat Enterprise Application Platform 5.2, it was found that the doFilter method in the ReadOnlyAccessFilter of the HTTP Invoker does not restrict classes for which it performs deserialization and thus allowing an attacker to execute arbitrary code via crafted serialized data.

criterions.comment: jbossas4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
